# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the action set.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Action set names must be unique within a home.

## Related Documentation

- **HomeKit Developer Guide**

## Identifiying an action set

- **uniqueIdentifier**: The action set’s unique identifier.
- **updateName(_:completionHandler:)**: Updates the name of the action set.

items.description: Updates the name of the action set.
items.name: updateName(_:completionHandler:)
